task_description:
# 1.4 Create Equipment Template API endpoints

**Linear Issue:** [BUI-22](https://linear.app/builder-project/issue/BUI-22/14-create-equipment-template-api-endpoints)
**Priority:** Medium
**Status:** Backlog


## Description

Create FastAPI endpoints for equipment templates.

**File:** backend/app/api/v1/equipment_templates.py

**Template Endpoints (Admin):**

* GET /equipment-templates - List all templates
* POST /equipment-templates - Create template
* GET /equipment-templates/{id} - Get template details
* PUT /equipment-templates/{id} - Update template
* DELETE /equipment-templates/{id} - Delete template

**Submissions:**

* GET /projects/{project_id}/equipment-submissions - List submissions
* POST /projects/{project_id}/equipment-submissions - Create submission
* GET /projects/{project_id}/equipment-submissions/{id} - Get submission
* PUT /projects/{project_id}/equipment-submissions/{id} - Update submission
* DELETE /projects/{project_id}/equipment-submissions/{id} - Delete submission

**Approvals:**

* POST /equipment-submissions/{id}/decisions - Add approval decision
* GET /equipment-submissions/{id}/decisions - Get all decisions

**Register in router:** backend/app/api/v1/**init**.py
